### What to turn-in

Please do the R work in R Markdown. Your Rmd file will be generated. Save this file as a PDF (or print to PDF) and **turn in the PDF file(s) and the Rmd file(s)**.

1.  Work through Chapters 4 through 7 of *Analyzing US Census Data*. Use an Rmd file to keep track of your progress.
2.  At the beginning of the Rmd file, use Markdown formatting to answer these questions:

3.  A separate Rmd of the weekly challenge.

**Hint:** Use PDFSam (or install it with Chocolatey) to merge multiple PDFs together. For example, create a layout in QGIS and export those maps to PDF. Then use PDFSam to merge those files.
